definition: head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc

sentences.english: Final award has already been made on the first newsprint paper antidumping case.
sentences.chinese: 首例新聞紙反傾銷案已經終裁。

sentences.english: This is the first successful report of cryopreservation of in vitro Cerasus humilis.
sentences.chinese: 這是歐李超低溫保存成功的首例報道。

sentences.english: That was just the first of over 400 human radiation experiments.
sentences.chinese: 這大概是400多次人類輻射試驗中的首例試驗。

sentences.english: The first case of arrhythmogenic right ventricular dysplasia (ARVD) in China was reported in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文報告了國內首例致心律失常性右室發育不良病例。

sentences.english: The KCGMH-LTP performed the first living donor liver transplant without transfusion of blood or blood products in the world.
sentences.chinese: 高雄長庚醫院完成全球首例未輸血活體肝臟移植手術。

sentences.english: This is the first and most serious example of medical negligence in the island's modern history.
sentences.chinese: 這是臺灣現代歷史上首例也是最嚴重的一例醫療疏忽。

sentences.english: It introduces the construction procedure of prefabricating caisson by semi- submerged barge practiced for the first time in Jinzhou Port.
sentences.chinese: 介紹錦州港首例利用半潛駁預製沉箱的施工過程。

sentences.english: Moorstone quarrying in tunnel is a first case carried out in China.
sentences.chinese: 隧道內開採花崗岩料石在國內尚屬首例。

sentences.english: Professor Zhang Lizhu, famous expert in Gynaecology and Obstetrics , and the first test-tube baby on Mainland.
sentences.chinese: 著名婦產科學家張麗珠教授與中國大陸首例試管嬰兒。

sentences.english: It is the first time that end - charging has been adopted on a walking -beam type steel tube reheating, furnace in China.
sentences.chinese: 步進梁式鋼管再加熱爐端部進料在國內尚屬首例。

sentences.english: Roller crushed concrete is adopted first within our country in dams with bottom conduits in Guanyinge reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 觀音閣水庫底孔壩段採用碾壓混凝土尚屬國內首例。

sentences.english: This would be the first known suicide from the 160-storey tower
sentences.chinese: 這將會是從160層得首例自殺。

sentences.english: Building waterpower ash storage site on goaf is the first example at home.
sentences.chinese: 採空區上建水力貯灰場在國內首例。

sentences.english: This is the first discovery of thaumasite form of sulfate attack in China.
sentences.chinese: 這是在我國發現的首例碳硫硅鈣石型硫酸鹽腐蝕。

sentences.english: Tests revealed the first-ever sex reversal in this dog breed.
sentences.chinese: 測試結果顯示，這是首例牛頭犬性反轉現象。

sentences.english: The world's first full face transplant patient, identified only as Oscar, appeared in public for the first time Monday.
sentences.chinese: 全球首例全臉移植患者奧斯卡於週一首次公開亮相。

definition: first case/first instance/first time (sth is done)
first (hotel of its type, store of its type etc)
to create/original creation/to be the first to do sth
to be a suspect (in a crime)/to be suspected of
to pronounce a sentence (after a verdict in a court of law)
to accept to hear a case/to handle (a service)
to uncover (a criminal plot)/to break open and capture
to adjudicate/to finish a trial/to try and pass verdict
test point/to carry out trial/pilot scheme
to learn of sth/to find out/to get news
